question.ques: Which country stunned Ireland in their first match of the World T20 in India in March?
Whose 47-ball century against England was the only hundred of the main World T20 competition?
Whose 5 for 22 against New Zealand were the best bowling figures of the World T20?
Whose four successive sixes in the last over spirited West Indies to an amazing victory in the World T20 final in April?
Who stoked a long-running feud with Shane Warne by quipping "maybe it's because my face is real and his is not"?
Who scored 387 runs at 129 in the three-Test series between England and Sri Lanka in May and June?
Which Sri Lankan had a forgettable time in the British Isles, being taken to hospital with an elevated heartbeat the same day his bowling action was ruled illegal by the ICC?
Who during July became the oldest man to score a Test century at Lord's since 1926?
Which unusual venue hosted West Indies' T20 internationals against India in August?
Whose T20 hundred in August completed his full set of centuries in all three formats in only his 15th international match overall?
